definition: adverb 1 [often used correlatively with 不管, 無論,  etc.] in any case; at any rate; anyway 老王來不來還沒決定, 反正小張一定來。 Lǎo wáng lái bù lái hái méi juédìng, fǎnzheng xiǎo zhāng yīdìng lái. Lao Wang hasn’t made up his mind whether to come or not; anyway Xiao Zhang is coming. 不管怎麼樣, 反正工作不能停。 Bùguǎn zěnmeyàng, fǎnzheng gōngzuò bù néng tíng. Come what may, the work must go on. 無論你怎麼說, 反正我不答應。 Wúlùn nǐ zěnme shuō, fǎnzheng wǒ bù dāying. No matter what you say, I won’t agree. 2 since; as 反正得去一個人, 就讓我去吧！ Fǎnzheng de qù yī ge rén, jiù ràng wǒ qù ba! Since someone has to go anyway, let me go. 反正路不遠, 咱們就走著去吧！ Fǎnzheng lù bù yuǎn, zánmen jiù zǒuzhe qù ba! As it’s not far, we might as well go on foot. 反正你不是外人, 我也就不客氣了。 Fǎnzheng nǐ bù shì wài rén, wǒ yě jiù bù kèqi le. Since you’re my friend, I won’t stand on ceremony.
formatted_back:
反正
PY fǎnzheng

ADVERB
1 [often used correlatively with 不管, 無論,  etc.] in any case; at any rate; anyway

老王來不來還沒決定, 反正小張一定來。
Lǎo wáng lái bù lái hái méi juédìng, fǎnzheng xiǎo zhāng yīdìng lái.
Lao Wang hasn’t made up his mind whether to come or not; anyway Xiao Zhang is coming.

不管怎麼樣, 反正工作不能停。
Bùguǎn zěnmeyàng, fǎnzheng gōngzuò bù néng tíng.
Come what may, the work must go on.

無論你怎麼說, 反正我不答應。
Wúlùn nǐ zěnme shuō, fǎnzheng wǒ bù dāying.
No matter what you say, I won’t agree.

2 since; as

反正得去一個人, 就讓我去吧！
Fǎnzheng de qù yī ge rén, jiù ràng wǒ qù ba!
Since someone has to go anyway, let me go.

反正路不遠, 咱們就走著去吧！
Fǎnzheng lù bù yuǎn, zánmen jiù zǒuzhe qù ba!
As it’s not far, we might as well go on foot.

反正你不是外人, 我也就不客氣了。
Fǎnzheng nǐ bù shì wài rén, wǒ yě jiù bù kèqi le.
Since you’re my friend, I won’t stand on ceremony.

definition:
verb 1 burn 燒穿 shāo chuān burn through 燒成灰燼 shāo chéng huījìn burn to ashes 把帽子燒了一個洞 Bǎ màozi shāo le yī ge dòng burn a hole in one’s hat 乾柴好燒。 Gānchái hǎo shāo. This furnace burns oil. 2 cook; heat; bake; roast 燒炭 Shāo tàn make charcoal 燒磚 Shāozhuān bake (or fire) bricks 燒一點兒水 shāo yīdiǎnr shuǐ heat up some water 水燒開了。 Shuǐ shāo kāi le. The water is boiling. 3 stew after frying or fry after stewing 燒茄子 shāo qiézi stewed eggplant 4 roast 燒乳豬 shāo rǔzhū roast suckling pig 5 run a fever; have a temperature 病人燒得厲害。 Bìngrén shāo de lìhai. The patient’s running a high fever. or The patient has a high temperature. 6 damage (or injure) by excessive (or improper) use of fertilizer 上的肥太多, 把根兒都燒壞了。 Shàng de féi tài duō, bǎ gēnr dōu shāohuài le. Overfertilization burned the roots. 
noun fever 燒退了。 Shāo tuì le. The fever is down. 
adjective colloquial swollen-headed 被成功燒得飄飄然 bèi chénggōng shāo de piāopiāorán be carried away by success 他讓錢燒得慌。 tā ràng qián shāodehuang. The money is burning a hole in his pocket. 她買彩票中了頭獎, 燒得不知怎麼才好。 Tā mǎi cǎipiào zhōng le tóujiǎng, shāo de bùzhī zěnme cáihǎo. She’s forgetting herself because she has hit the jackpot.

definition:
verb match; balance; correspond to; about equal to; commensurate with 得失相當。 Dé-shī xiāngdāng. The gains balance the losses. 兩隊實力相當。 Liǎng duì shílì xiāngdāng. The two teams are about equal in strength. 他們倆年齡相當。 Tāmen liǎ niánlíng xiāngdāng. They are well-matched in age. or They’re about the same age. 你的月薪相當(於)我的兩倍。 nǐ de yuèxīn xiāngdāng wǒ de liǎng bèi. Your salary is twice mine. 這筆錢大概相當(於)我三個月的開銷。 Zhè bǐ qián dàgài xiāngdāng wǒ sān ge yuè de kāixiao. This amount is about what I spend in three months. 水壩高達七十八米, 相當於二十層的大樓。 Shuǐbà gāo dá qīshíbā mǐ, xiāngdāngyú èrshí céng de dàlóu. The dam is 78 metres high, as tall as a 20-storey building. 
adjective suitable; fit; appropriate 他一時想不出相當的字眼來。 Tā yīshí xiǎng bù chū xiāngdāng de zìyǎn lái. At the time he couldn’t think of a suitable word for it. 這個工作還沒有找到相當的人。 Zhège gōngzuò hái méiyǒu zhǎodào xiāngdāng de rén. We haven’t found a good person for the job yet. 
adverb quite; considerably 相當好 Xiāngdāng hǎo quite good 演出相當成功。 Yǎnchū xiāngdāng chénggōng. The performance was a total success.
formatted_back:

nǐ de yuèxīn xiāngdāng wǒ de liǎng bèi.

definition:
adverb 1 feel free to; not hesitate to 你儘管拿吧。 Nǐ jǐnguǎn ná ba. You’re welcome to it. or Take as much as you like. 工作有我們, 你儘管放心吧。 Gōngzuò yǒu wǒmen, nǐ jǐnguǎn fàngxīn ba. Don’t worry. We’ll look after things. 有什麼問題儘管問。 Yǒu shénme wèntí jǐnguǎn wèn. If you have any questions, don’t hesitate to ask. 2 dialect always; all the time 
conjunction though; even though; in spite of; despite 儘管旱情嚴重, 今年的小麥還是豐收了。 Jǐnguǎn hànqíng yánzhòng, jīnnián de xiǎomài háishi fēngshōu le. Despite the serious drought, the wheat harvest this year was good. 儘管身體不好, 他仍然堅持工作。 jǐnguǎn shēntǐ bù hǎo, tā réngrán jiānchí gōngzuò. Though he’s not in good health, he still keeps working. 我喜歡這個工作, 儘管報酬很低。 Wǒ xǐhuan zhège gōngzuò, jǐnguǎn bàochou hěn dī. I like the job, even though it’s badly paid.
formatted_back:

PY jǐnguǎn

ADVERB
1 feel free to; not hesitate to

你儘管拿吧。
Nǐ jǐnguǎn ná ba.
You’re welcome to it. or Take as much as you like.

工作有我們, 你儘管放心吧。
Gōngzuò yǒu wǒmen, nǐ jǐnguǎn fàngxīn ba.
Don’t worry. We’ll look after things.

有什麼問題儘管問。
Yǒu shénme wèntí jǐnguǎn wèn.
If you have any questions, don’t hesitate to ask.

2 DIALECT
always; all the time

CONJUNCTION
though; even though; in spite of; despite

儘管旱情嚴重, 今年的小麥還是豐收了。
Jǐnguǎn hànqíng yánzhòng, jīnnián de xiǎomài háishi fēngshōu le.

儘管身體不好, 他仍然堅持工作。
jǐnguǎn shēntǐ bù hǎo, tā réngrán jiānchí gōngzuò.
Though he’s not in good health, he still keeps working.

我喜歡這個工作, 儘管報酬很低。
Wǒ xǐhuan zhège gōngzuò, jǐnguǎn bàochou hěn dī.
I like the job, even though it’s badly paid.

His words are very telling. 事實充分說明這種做法是正確的。 Shìshí chōngfèn shuōmíng zhèzhǒng zuòfǎ shì zhèngquè de. The facts show clearly that this procedure is correct.

definition:
noun 1 place 住所 zhùsuǒ dwelling place; residence 2 office; bureau; institute 指揮所 zhǐhuīsuǒ command post 3 dated troop station in the Ming Dynasty 
measure word [for houses, schools, hospitals, etc.] 兩所學校 liǎng suǒ xuéxiào two schools 一所房子 Yī suǒ fángzi a house 這所醫院 zhè suǒ yīyuàn this hospital 
auxiliary literary 1 [noun or pronoun＋所＋verb] a [with 的 to modify a noun] 我所認識的人 wǒ suǒ rènshi de rén the people I know 大家所提的意見 dàjiā suǒ tí de yìjian the opinions various people put forward b [with 的 as a noun] 他所說的未必確實。 Tā suǒ shuō de wèibì quèshí. What he says is not necessarily true. 我所知道的就這些。 Wǒ suǒ zhīdao de jiù zhèxiē. That’s all I know. c [as a noun without 的, esp. when the verb is monosyllabic] 所到之處 suǒdàozhīchù wherever one goes 所見所聞 suǒjiànsuǒwén what one sees and hears 盡我所能 jìn wǒ suǒ néng do all I can 據你所說 jù nǐ suǒ shuō from what you say 2 [所＋verb] a [with 的 to modify a noun] 所需的費用 suǒ xū de fèiyong necessary expenses 所用的方法 suǒ yòng de fāngfǎ the methods which are used b [with 的 as a noun] 所需的並不多。 Suǒ xū de bìng bù duō. What is needed is not much. 我們所考慮的正是這一點。 wǒmensuǒ kǎolǜ de zhèngshì zhè yīdiǎn. That’s just what we have under consideration. c [as a noun without 的, esp. in set phrases in which the verb is monosyllabic] 各盡所能 gèjìnsuǒnéng from each according to his ability 3 [為 or 被＋ noun or pronoun ＋所＋ verb, expressing a passive meaning] 為人所笑 wéi rén suǒ xiào be laughed at by other people 被表面現象所迷惑 bèi biǎomiàn xiànxiàng suǒ míhuo be misled by outward appearances 4 [所＋ verb used as the object of 有 or 無] a [as the object of 有] 有所創造 yǒusuǒ chuàngzào create something or other 有所準備 yǒusuǒ zhǔnbèi be prepared in some way or other b [as the object of 無, esp. in set phrases] 無所準備 wú suǒ zhǔnbèi need do nothing in preparation for it 無所用心 wúsuǒyòngxīn not give serious thought to anything

別老悶在屋裡看書, 出來活動活動。

definition:

adverb at present; in the immediate future 在即 zàijí in the near future 
verb literary be; mean 非此即彼。 Fēicǐjíbǐ. It must be either this or that. 春節即農曆新年。 Chūnjié jí nónglì xīnnián. The Spring Festival is the lunar New Year. 元代建都於大都, 即今之北京。 Yuándài jiàndū yú dà dōu, jí jīn zhī Běijīng. The Yuan Dynasty established its capital in Dadu, or the present-day Beijing. 對一些大學生來說, 畢業即失業。 Duì yīxiē dàxué shēnglái shuō, bìyè jí shīyè. For some college students, graduation meant unemployment. 
adverb promptly; at once 即插即用 jíchājíyòng plug and play 即付匯票 jí fù huìpiào payable on demand 函索即寄 hánsuǒjíjì available on request by letter 聞過即改 Wénguòjígǎi correct one’s mistake as soon as it is pointed out 召之即來 zhào zhī jí lái be on call at any hour 以上問題盼即答復。 Yǐshàng wèntí pàn jí dáfù. We expect prompt answers to the above questions. 
conjunction 1 and 2 even; even if 即遇困難, 亦應按期完成任務。 Jí yù kùnnan, yì yīng ànqī wánchéng rènwu. We should fulfill the mission even if we run up against difficulties.

PREPOSITION
1 [indicating time or place] in; on; at

生於上海
shēngyú Shànghǎi
born in Shanghai

馳名於全世界
chímíng yú quánshìjiè

study at Beijing University

來信於十五日收到。
Láixìn yú shíwǔ rì shōudào.
Your letter was received on the 15th.

此項工程將於三年內完成。
Cǐ xiàng gōngchéng jiāng yú sān nián nèi wánchéng.
This project is to be completed within three years.

第一次世界大戰爆發於一九一四年。
Dì-yī cì shìjiè dàzhàn bàofā yú yī jiǔyīsì nián.
The First World War broke out in 1914.

2 [indicating direction] toward; to

求助於人
qiúzhùyúrén
ask people for help

熱衷於集郵
rèzhōng yú jíyóu
be keen on stamp collecting

3 [indicating giving or yielding to sb.] to; onto

腐朽的勢力讓位於新生的勢力。
Fǔxiǔ de shìli ràngwèi yú xīn shēng de shìli.
Decaying forces give way to new rising forces.

4 with regard to; concerning; to

有利於提高產量
Yǒulì yú tígāo chǎnliàng
be conducive to higher yields

操之過急, 於事無補。
Cāozhīguòjí, yúshìwúbǔ.
It would be of no avail to act with undue haste.

這樣於你自己不利。
Zhèyàng yú nǐ zìjǐ bùlì.
It won’t do you any good.

5 [indicating beginning or origin] from

黃河發源於青海。
Huáng Hé fā yuányú Qīnghǎi.
The Yellow River rises in Qinghai Province.

認識來源於實踐。
Rènshi láiyuányú shíjiàn.
Knowledge comes from practice.

6 [indicating comparison] than

不少於五千人
Bù shǎoyú wǔqiān rén
no less than 5,000 people

友誼貴於黃金。
Yǒuyì guì yú huángjīn.
Friendship is more precious than gold.

金星略小於地球。
Jīnxīng lüè xiǎoyú dìqiú.
Venus is a little smaller than the earth.

7 [indicating the doer of an action] by

見笑於人
Jiànxiào yú rén
be laughed at (by others)

主隊敗於客隊。
Zhǔduì bài yú kèduì.
The home team was defeated by the visiting team.


AFFIX
[after a verb or an adjective]

屬於
shǔyú
belong to

勇於
yǒngyú
have the courage to; dare to

至於
zhìyú
as for

definition:
noun main points; essentials 擇要記錄 Zéyào jìlù note down the essential points 
adjective important; essential 要法 yào fǎ important method; necessary way 上述規定希嚴格執行為要。 Shàngshù guīdìng xī yángé zhíxíng wéi yào. It is imperative that the above rules be strictly observed. 
verb 1 want; ask for; wish; desire 誰沒有票, 問她要。 Shuí méi yǒu piào, wèn tā yào. Anyone without a ticket can ask her for one. 他要一架手風琴。 Tā yào yī jià shǒufēngqín. He wants an accordion. 我要了兩個菜。 Wǒ yào le liǎng ge cài. I ordered two dishes. 這雙鞋我還要呢。 Zhè shuāng xié wǒ háiyào ne. I want to keep these shoes. 2 ask (or want) sb. to do sth. 不是你要我來的嗎？ Bù shì nǐ yào wǒ lái de ma？ Wasn’t it you who asked me to come? 3 need; take 這活兒要不了這麼多人。 Zhè huór yàobuliǎo zhème duō rén. You don’t need so many people for this job. 這項任務要十天才能完成。 Zhè xiàng rènwu yào shí tiān cái néng wánchéng. It will take ten days to get the work done. 
verb 1 must; should; it is necessary (or imperative, essential) 借東西要還。 Jiè dōngxi yào huán. One should return what one borrows. 我要不要留下來？ Wǒ yào bù yào liú xià lái？ Shall I stay? 這個問題要仔細考慮。 Zhège wèntí yào zǐxì kǎolǜ. This question calls for careful consideration. 2 shall; will; be going to 要下雨了。 Yào xià yǔ le. It’s going to rain. 他快要回來了。 Tā kuàiyào huílai le. He will soon be back. 天要黑了, 快走吧。 Tiān yào hēi le, kuài zǒu ba. It’s getting dark. Let’s hurry up! 會議要到月底才能結束。 Huìyì yào dào yuèdǐ cái néng jiéshù. The conference will not end till the end of the month. 3 want to; wish to 他要學游泳。 Tā yào xué yóuyǒng. He wants to learn swimming. 我還有幾句話要說。 Wǒ háiyǒu jǐ jù huà yào shuō. I’d like to say a few more words. 4 [in comparisons to indicate an estimate] 樹蔭底下比屋子裡要涼快些。 shùyīn dǐxia bǐ wūzi lǐ yào liángkuai xiē. It is cooler under the tree than in the room. 
conjunction 1 if; suppose; in case 明天要下雨, 我們就不去了。 Míngtiān yào xiàyǔ, wǒmen jiù bù qù le. If it rains tomorrow, we won’t go. 他要來不了呢？ Tā yào láibuliǎo ne？ Suppose he can’t come? 我要趕不回來, 你替我說一聲。 Wǒ yào gǎn bù huílai, nǐ tì wǒ shuō yī shēng. In case I can’t get back in time, please apologize for me. 這有什麼可怕的, 要我就不怕。 Zhè yǒu shénme kěpà de, yào wǒ jiù bù pà. What is there to be afraid of? I wouldn’t be afraid if I were you. 2 [usu. with 就 or 就是] or; either... or... 要就去跳舞, 要就去聽音樂, 別處我不去。 Yào jiù qù tiàowǔ,  yào jiù qù tīng yīnyuè, biéchù wǒ bù qù. Let’s go either to the dance or to the concert. I won’t go anywhere else.

yào fǎ

3 need; take

One should return what one borrows.

我要不要留下來？
Wǒ yào bù yào liú xià lái？
Shall I stay?

這個問題要仔細考慮。
Zhège wèntí yào zǐxì kǎolǜ.
This question calls for careful consideration.

2 shall; will; be going to

要下雨了。
Yào xià yǔ le.
It’s going to rain.

他快要回來了。
Tā kuàiyào huílai le.
He will soon be back.

天要黑了, 快走吧。
Tiān yào hēi le, kuài zǒu ba.
It’s getting dark. Let’s hurry up!

會議要到月底才能結束。
Huìyì yào dào yuèdǐ cái néng jiéshù.
The conference will not end till the end of the month.

3 want to; wish to

他要學游泳。
Tā yào xué yóuyǒng.
He wants to learn swimming.

我還有幾句話要說。
Wǒ háiyǒu jǐ jù huà yào shuō.
I’d like to say a few more words.

4 [in comparisons to indicate an estimate]

樹蔭底下比屋子裡要涼快些。
shùyīn dǐxia bǐ wūzi lǐ yào liángkuai xiē.
It is cooler under the tree than in the room.


CONJUNCTION
1 if; suppose; in case

明天要下雨, 我們就不去了。
Míngtiān yào xiàyǔ, wǒmen jiù bù qù le.
If it rains tomorrow, we won’t go.

他要來不了呢？
Tā yào láibuliǎo ne？
Suppose he can’t come?

我要趕不回來, 你替我說一聲。
Wǒ yào gǎn bù huílai, nǐ tì wǒ shuō yī shēng.
In case I can’t get back in time, please apologize for me.

這有什麼可怕的, 要我就不怕。
Zhè yǒu shénme kěpà de, yào wǒ jiù bù pà.
What is there to be afraid of? I wouldn’t be afraid if I were you.

2 [usu. with 就 or 就是] or; either... or...

要就去跳舞, 要就去聽音樂, 別處我不去。
Yào jiù qù tiàowǔ,  yào jiù qù tīng yīnyuè, biéchù wǒ bù qù.
Let’s go either to the dance or to the concert. I won’t go anywhere else.

My opinion is contrary to yours (or is just the opposite of yours). 結果與我們的願望恰好相反。 Jiéguǒ yǔ wǒmen de yuànwàng qiàhǎo xiāngfǎn. The result turned out contrary to our expectations. 他們朝著相反的方向開走了。 Tāmen cháozhe xiāngfǎn de fāngxiàng kāi zǒu le. They drove off in opposite directions. 他跟他弟弟對政治持相反的觀點。 Tā gēn tā dìdi duì zhèngzhì chí xiāngfǎn de guāndiǎn. He and his brother have opposite views on politics. 
conjunction on the contrary 他們根本不是好朋友, 恰恰相反, 是死對頭。 Tāmen gēnběn bù shì hǎo péngyou, qiàqià xiāngfǎn, shì sǐduìtou. Far from being good friends, they are bitter enemies. 他一點兒也不吝嗇, 相反,  沒有比他更大方的了。 Tā yīdiǎnr yě bù lìnsè,  xiāngfǎn, méiyǒu bǐ tā gèng dàfang de le. He is not stingy at all; on the contrary, no one could be more generous.
formatted_back:
相反
PY xiāngfǎn

ADJECTIVE
contrary; opposite

我的意思跟你正相反。
Wǒ de yìsi gēn nǐ zhèng xiāngfǎn.
My opinion is contrary to yours (or is just the opposite of yours).

結果與我們的願望恰好相反。
Jiéguǒ yǔ wǒmen de yuànwàng qiàhǎo xiāngfǎn.
The result turned out contrary to our expectations.

他們朝著相反的方向開走了。
Tāmen cháozhe xiāngfǎn de fāngxiàng kāi zǒu le.
They drove off in opposite directions.

他跟他弟弟對政治持相反的觀點。
Tā gēn tā dìdi duì zhèngzhì chí xiāngfǎn de guāndiǎn.
He and his brother have opposite views on politics.


CONJUNCTION
on the contrary

他們根本不是好朋友, 恰恰相反, 是死對頭。
Tāmen gēnběn bù shì hǎo péngyou, qiàqià xiāngfǎn, shì sǐduìtou.
Far from being good friends, they are bitter enemies.

他一點兒也不吝嗇, 相反,  沒有比他更大方的了。
Tā yīdiǎnr yě bù lìnsè,  xiāngfǎn, méiyǒu bǐ tā gèng dàfang de le.
He is not stingy at all; on the contrary, no one could be more generous.

definition:
noun 1 wheel 十輪卡車 shí lún kǎchē ten-wheel truck 2 sth. resembling a wheel; disc; ring 光輪 guānglún halo 3 steamboat; steamer 漁輪 yúlún fishing vessel 
verb take turns 一個人輪一天 Yī ge rén lún yī tiān each person takes their turn for a day 今天輪到我值班。 Jīntiān lún dào wǒ zhíbān. It’s my turn to be on duty today. 下一個就輪到你了。 Xià yī ge jiù lún dào nǐ le. It will be your turn next. 
measure word 1 [for the sun, the moon, etc.] 一輪紅日 yī lún hóngrì a red sun 一輪明月 yī lún míngyuè a bright moon 2 round 第一輪比賽 dì-yī lún bǐsài the first round of the match 新的一輪會談 xīn de yī lún huìtán a new round of talks 3 [a circle of 12 years] 我比你大一輪兒。 Wǒ bǐ nǐ dàyī lún r. I’m twelve years your senior.

我比你大一輪兒。

definition:
noun foundation 人民是國家的基本。 Rénmín shì guójiā de jīběn. The people are the foundation of a nation. 
adjective main; essential; basic; fundamental; elementary 具備生產的基本條件 Jùbèi shēngchǎn dejīběn tiáojiàn have the basic conditions necessary for production 他們之間存在著基本分歧。 Tāmen zhījiān cúnzài zhe jīběn fēnqí. Fundamental differences exist between them. 
adverb basically; in the main; on the whole; by and large 情況基本屬實。 Qíngkuàng jīběn shǔshí. It has been found to be basically true. 那項工程已基本完工。 Nà xiàng gōngchéng yǐ jīběn wángōng. The project has been basically completed.

definition:
preposition 1 in the interest of; for 為大多數人謀利益 Wèi dàduōshù rén móu lìyì work in the interests of the vast majority 2 because of 為勝利而歡呼 Wèi shènglì ér huānhū hail a victory 為我們的友誼乾杯！ Wèi wǒmen de yǒuyì gānbēi! A toast to our friendship! 3 for the purpose of; for the sake of 為方便起見 wèi fāngbiàn qǐjiàn for the sake of convenience 不為名, 不為利 bù wèi míng, bù wèi lì seek no personal fame or gain 讓我們為實現這一宏偉目標而共同努力。 Ràng wǒmen wèi shíxiàn zhè yī hóngwěi mùbiāo ér gòngtóng nǔlì. Let us strive together to attain this splendid goal. 4 to; towards 他為我送來一份請帖。 Tā wèi wǒ sòng lái yī fèn qǐngtiě. He’s sent me an invitation. 且為諸君言之。 Qiě wèi zhūjūn yán zhī. I’ll let you know.

adjective sad; grieved; sorrowful (opp. 快樂) 過分悲傷 guòfèn bēishāng overcome by grief; excessive grief 為無法避免的事情悲傷, 又有何用。 wèi wúfǎ bìmiǎn de shìqingbēishāng, yòu yǒu héyòng. It’s no good grieving over things that cannot be helped.

悲傷〔悲伤〕

kèfú bēishāng

the joys and sorrows of life

她滿懷悲傷。
Tā mǎnhuái bēishāng.

sad; grieved; sorrowful (opp. 快樂)

wèi wúfǎ bìmiǎn de shìqingbēishāng, yòu yǒu héyòng.

definition: conjunction since; as; now that 既然如此 jìránrúcǐ since it is so; such being the case 你既然表示了決心, 就應該見之於行動。 Nǐ jìrán biǎoshì le juéxīn, jiù yīnggāi jiàn zhī yú xíngdòng. Now that you have expressed your determination, you should act. 既然事前提醒過他們, 他們就沒什麼可埋怨的。 Jìrán shìqián tíxǐng guò tāmen, tāmen jiù méi shénme kě mányuàn de. Since they had a fair warning, they have no reason to complain. 既然你沒準備好, 我們只能先走了。 Jìrán nǐ méi zhǔnbèi hǎo, wǒmen zhǐnéng xiān zǒu le. As you are not ready, we must go without you.
formatted_back:

PY jìrán

CONJUNCTION
since; as; now that

既然如此
jìránrúcǐ
since it is so; such being the case

你既然表示了決心, 就應該見之於行動。
Nǐ jìrán biǎoshì le juéxīn, jiù yīnggāi jiàn zhī yú xíngdòng.
Now that you have expressed your determination, you should act.

既然事前提醒過他們, 他們就沒什麼可埋怨的。
Jìrán shìqián tíxǐng guò tāmen, tāmen jiù méi shénme kě mányuàn de.
Since they had a fair warning, they have no reason to complain.

既然你沒準備好, 我們只能先走了。
Jìrán nǐ méi zhǔnbèi hǎo, wǒmen zhǐnéng xiān zǒu le.
As you are not ready, we must go without you.

definition: conjunction [correlatively with 不如 or 毋寧] rather than; better than 與其你去, 不如我去。 Yǔ qí nǐ qù, bù rú wǒ qù. Rather than having you go, it’d be better if I went. 你與其坐車, 不如坐船。 Nǐ yǔ qí zuò chē, bùrú zuòchuán. It’s better for you to go by boat than by train. 與其說是粗心大意, 不如說是不負責任。 Yǔqí shuō shì cūxīndàyì, bùrú shuō shì bù fù zérèn. It’s not so much carelessness as irresponsibility.

definition:
verb literary go; leave for 由京之渝 Yóu jīng zhī yú leave Beijing for Chongqing 君將何之？ Jūn jiāng hé zhī？ Where are you bound for? 
pronoun literary 1 [in place of an objective noun or pronoun] 將如之何？ Jiāng rú zhī hé？ What is to be done? 影片情節十分悲慘, 觀眾無不為之感動。 Yǐngpiàn qíngjié shífēn bēicǎn, guānzhòng wúbù wèi zhī gǎndòng. The film was so sad that everyone was moved. 2 [in certain set phrases without definite designation] 手之舞之, 足之蹈之 Shǒu zhī wǔ zhī, zú zhī dǎo zhī dance with joy 我們三個人我最年長, 李次之, 張又次之。 Wǒmen sān ge rén wǒ zuì niánzhǎng,  lǐ cìzhī, zhāng yòu cì zhī. Of the three of us, I am the eldest, Li is younger, and Zhang is the youngest. 3 this; that 之子于歸。 Zhīzǐyúguī. The maiden goes to her future home. 
auxiliary 1 [between an attribute and the word it modifies] 寶中之寶 Bǎozhōngzhībǎo the treasure of treasures; the most precious 抱歉之至 bàoqiàn zhī zhì awfully sorry 得意之極 déyì zhī jí very pleased with oneself 感激之至 gǎnjī zhī zhì deeply grateful 三分之一 sānfēn zhīyī one-third 一水之隔 yīshuǐzhīgé separated only by a river 以我之長, 攻敵之短 yǐ wǒ zhī cháng, gōng dí zhī duǎn utilize our strong points to attack the enemy at his weak points 原因之一 yuányīn zhīyī one of the reasons 鐘鼓之聲 Zhōng-gǔ zhī shēng the sound of drums and bells 百分之八十 bǎifēn zhī bāshí eighty per cent 非常之需要 fēicháng zhī xūyào highly necessary 非常之正確 fēicháng zhī zhèngquè absolutely right 急群眾之急 jí qúnzhòng zhī jí eager to meet the needs of the populace 五千年之久 wǔqiān nián zhī jiǔ as long as five thousand years 不勝榮幸之至 bù shèng róngxìng zhī zhì feel greatly honoured 我之所以討厭他是因為他的嘴太貧。 Wǒ zhīsuǒyǐ tǎoyàn tā shì yīnwèi tā de zuǐ tài pín. I dislike him because he is too garrulous. 弦樂器是指琵琶, 二胡, 小提琴之類。 xiányuèqì shì zhǐ pípa, èrhú, xiǎotíqín zhī lèi. Stringed instruments refer to the pipa, erhu, and violin, etc. 2 literary [between the subject and the predicate in an S-P structure so as to make it nominalized] 如因勢利導, 則如水之就下, 極為自然。 Rú yīnshìlìdǎo,  zé rú shuǐ zhī jiù xià, jíwéi zìrán. If we guide the matter along their course of development, it will proceed as naturally as water flows downwards.

go; leave for

LITERARY

影片情節十分悲慘, 觀眾無不為之感動。

2 [in certain set phrases without definite designation]

手之舞之, 足之蹈之
Shǒu zhī wǔ zhī, zú zhī dǎo zhī
dance with joy

我們三個人我最年長, 李次之, 張又次之。
Wǒmen sān ge rén wǒ zuì niánzhǎng,  lǐ cìzhī, zhāng yòu cì zhī.

3 this; that

之子于歸。
Zhīzǐyúguī.
The maiden goes to her future home.


AUXILIARY
1 [between an attribute and the word it modifies]

寶中之寶

Zhōng-gǔ zhī shēng

fēicháng zhī xūyào

非常之正確
fēicháng zhī zhèngquè
absolutely right

急群眾之急
jí qúnzhòng zhī jí

wǔqiān nián zhī jiǔ
as long as five thousand years

不勝榮幸之至
bù shèng róngxìng zhī zhì
feel greatly honoured

我之所以討厭他是因為他的嘴太貧。
Wǒ zhīsuǒyǐ tǎoyàn tā shì yīnwèi tā de zuǐ tài pín.
I dislike him because he is too garrulous.

弦樂器是指琵琶, 二胡, 小提琴之類。
xiányuèqì shì zhǐ pípa, èrhú, xiǎotíqín zhī lèi.
Stringed instruments refer to the pipa, erhu, and violin, etc.

2 LITERARY
[between the subject and the predicate in an S-P structure so as to make it nominalized]

如因勢利導, 則如水之就下, 極為自然。
Rú yīnshìlìdǎo,  zé rú shuǐ zhī jiù xià, jíwéi zìrán.

definition: auxiliary 1 [added to a verb or adjective to indicate a continued action or state, often with the particle 呢 at the end of the sentence] 大門敞著。 Dàmén chǎngzhe. The gate is wide open. 雪正下著呢。 Xuě zhèng xià zhe ne. It’s snowing. 別站著, 坐下吧。 Bié zhànzhe, zuòxia ba. No need to stand, please sit down. 他穿著一身新衣服。 Tā chuānzhe yī shēn xīn yīfu. He is wearing new clothes. 夜深了, 屋裡的燈卻還亮著。 Yèshēn le, wū lǐ de dēng què hái liàng zhe. It was late at night, but the lights in the room were still on. 他們正談著話呢, 請你在外頭等幾分鐘吧。 Tāmen zhèng tán zhe huà ne, qǐng nǐ zài wàitou děng jǐ fēnzhōng ba. They are talking just now, please wait outside a few minutes. 2 [in sentences beginning with a place word, added to the verb to indicate a resultant state, the verb plus 著 having the force of “there is”] 牆上掛著一幅山水畫。 Qiáng shàng guà zhe yī fú shānshuǐhuà. On the wall hangs a landscape painting. 桌上放著好些東西。 Zhuō shàng fàng zhe hǎoxiē dōngxi. There are a lot of things on the table. 3 [verb plus 著 placed before another verb, indicating an accompanying action or state] a [verb plus 著 serving as an adverbial modifier] 他愛吃著飯看報。 Tā ài chī zhe fàn kànbào. He likes to read the newspaper while eating. 他老低著頭走路。 Tā lǎo dī zhe tóu zǒulù. He always walks with his head bent. 他正忙著準備考試。 Tā zhèng mángzhe zhǔnbèi kǎoshì. He is busy preparing for the examination. 孩子們急著要出去玩兒。 Háizi men jí zhe yào chūqu wánr. The children are in a hurry to go outside and play. 路不遠, 咱們走著去吧。 Lù bù yuǎn, zánmen zǒu zhe qù ba. It’s quite near, let’s go on foot. 探險隊冒著大雪上山。 Tànxiǎnduì mào zhe dàxuě shàngshān. The expedition climbed the mountain in spite of the heavy snow. b [verb plus 著 repeated, indicating that while one action is in progress another is expected] 她想著想著笑了起來。 Tā xiǎng zhe xiǎng zhe xiào le qǐlai. She thought for a while and then burst out laughing. 走著走著天色暗了下來。 Zǒu zhe zǒu zhe tiānsè àn le xiàlai. As we walked along, it began to grow dark. 4 [in imperative sentences, used after verbs or adjectives for emphasis, often with 點兒 added] 等著！ Děngzhe! Wait! 慢著！ Mànzhe! Hold it! 快著點兒。 Kuài zhe diǎnr. Hurry! 你聽著。 Nǐ tīngzhe. Listen! 過馬路看著點兒。 Guò mǎlù kànzhe diǎnr. Mind when you cross the street. 這事你記著點兒。 Zhè shì nǐ jì zhe diǎnr. Be sure to remember this. or Don’t forget! 5 [in forming a preposition] 向著 xiàngzhe towards 沿著馬路 Yán zhe mǎlù along the road
formatted_back:
著〔着〕
PY zhe

AUXILIARY
1 [added to a verb or adjective to indicate a continued action or state, often with the particle 呢 at the end of the sentence]

大門敞著。
Dàmén chǎngzhe.

雪正下著呢。

3 [verb plus 著 placed before another verb, indicating an accompanying action or state]
a [verb plus 著 serving as an adverbial modifier]

路不遠, 咱們走著去吧。

b [verb plus 著 repeated, indicating that while one action is in progress another is expected]

她想著想著笑了起來。

走著走著天色暗了下來。

4 [in imperative sentences, used after verbs or adjectives for emphasis, often with 點兒 added]

等著！

慢著！
Mànzhe!
Hold it!

快著點兒。
Kuài zhe diǎnr.
Hurry!

你聽著。
Nǐ tīngzhe.

過馬路看著點兒。
Guò mǎlù kànzhe diǎnr.

這事你記著點兒。
Zhè shì nǐ jì zhe diǎnr.

definition:
adverb really; as expected; sure enough 果然名不虛傳。 Guǒrán míngbùxūchuán. A well-deserved reputation. 果然你說對了。 Guǒrán nǐ shuō duìle. Sure enough what you said was right. 他說要下雪, 果然就下了。 Tā shuō yào xiàxuě, guǒrán jiù xià le. He said it would snow, and sure enough it did. 
conjunction if indeed; if really 事情果然是那樣, 那就好辦了。 Shìqing guǒrán shì nàyàng, nà jiù hǎo bàn le. If that’s really how things are, there should be no difficulty.

果然你說對了。

Tā shuō yào xiàxuě, guǒrán jiù xià le.
He said it would snow, and sure enough it did.


CONJUNCTION

I can’t remember the exact address, but it’s somewhere near the Summer Palace.
formatted_back:
總之〔总之〕
PY zǒngzhī

CONJUNCTION
1 in a word; in short; in brief

我是既沒工夫又沒興趣, 總之, 我不幹。
Wǒ shì jì méi gōngfu yòu méi xìngqù,  zǒngzhī, wǒ bù gàn.
I have neither the time nor the inclination; in short, I refuse to do it.

2 anyway; anyhow

確切地址我記不清了, 總之是在頤和園附近。
Quèqiè dìzhǐ wǒ jìbuqīng le, zǒngzhī shì zài Yíhéyuán fùjìn.
I can’t remember the exact address, but it’s somewhere near the Summer Palace.

definition:
adjective sudden; abrupt; unexpected 突然死亡 Tūrán sǐwáng sudden (or unexpected) death 準備對付一切突然事變 Zhǔnbèi duìfu yīqiè tūrán shìbiàn prepare for all eventualities (or contingencies) 他病得太突然。 tā bìng de tài tūrán. definition:
verb direct against; aim; counter 這個講話針對性很強。 Zhège jiǎnghuà zhēnduìxìng hěn qiáng. There was no mistaking thrust of the talk. or The talk was highly relevant. 本條約不針對任何第三國。 běn tiáoyuē bù zhēnduì rènhé dì Sānguó. This treaty is not directed against any third country. 針對這種傾向, 我們需要加強自然科學基礎理論的研究。 zhēnduì zhèzhǒng qīngxiàng, wǒmen xūyào jiāqiáng zìrán kēxué jīchǔ lǐlùn de yánjiū. To counter this tendency, we must increase research in basic theories of natural science. 
preposition in light of; in accordance with; in connection with 針對這種情況 zhēnduì zhèzhǒng qíngkuàng in view of this situation; in light of this state of affairs 針對兒童的特點進行教育 Zhēnduì értóng de tèdiǎn jìnxíng jiàoyù children’s education that suits children
formatted_back:

PY zhēnduì

VERB
direct against; aim; counter

這個講話針對性很強。
Zhège jiǎnghuà zhēnduìxìng hěn qiáng.
There was no mistaking thrust of the talk. or The talk was highly relevant.

本條約不針對任何第三國。
běn tiáoyuē bù zhēnduì rènhé dì Sānguó.
This treaty is not directed against any third country.

針對這種傾向, 我們需要加強自然科學基礎理論的研究。
zhēnduì zhèzhǒng qīngxiàng, wǒmen xūyào jiāqiáng zìrán kēxué jīchǔ lǐlùn de yánjiū.
To counter this tendency, we must increase research in basic theories of natural science.

zhēnduì zhèzhǒng qíngkuàng

definition: auxiliary 1 [at the end of a special, alternative, or rhetorical question] 你剛纔到哪兒去了呢？ Nǐ gāngcái dào nǎr qù le ne？ Where were you just now? 你到底認不認得她呢？ Nǐ dào dǐ rèn bù rèn de tā ne？ Do you know her or not? 你對這件事是贊成呢, 還是反對呢？ Nǐ duì zhè jiàn shì shì zànchéng ne, hái shì fǎnduì ne？ Are you for or against this? 他們都有任務了, 我呢？ Tāmen dōu yǒu rènwu le, wǒ ne? They’ve got assignments, what about me? 我錯在哪兒呢？ Wǒ cuò zài nǎr ne？ What is my mistake? 我怎麼能不記得呢？ Wǒ zěnme néng bù jìde ne？ How could I forget this? 這點子事, 何必大驚小怪呢？ Zhè diǎnzi shì, hébì dàjīngxiǎoguài ne？ Why get so excited over such a little thing? 2 [at the end of a declarative sentence to reinforce the assertion] 遠得很, 有好幾千里地呢。 Yuǎn de hěn, yǒu hǎo jǐqiān lǐ dì ne. It’s a long way off—thousands of li away. 3 [at the end of a declarative sentence to indicate the continuation of an action or a state] 他還在生氣呢。 Tā hái zài shēngqì ne. He’s still angry. 張先生, 有人找你呢。 Zhāng xiānsheng, yǒurén zhǎo nǐ ne. Mr Zhang, somebody is looking for you. 4 [used to mark a pause] 不下雨呢, 就去;下雨呢, 就不去。 Bù xià yǔ ne,  jiù qù ； xiàyǔ ne, jiù bù qù. If it doesn’t rain, we’ll go; if it does, we won’t. 如今呢, 可比以往任何時候都要強。 Rújīn ne, kě bǐ yǐwǎng rènhé shíhou dōu yào qiáng. As for the present, things are far better than at any time in the past.
formatted_back:
吶
PY ne

AUXILIARY
1 [at the end of a special, alternative, or rhetorical question]

你剛纔到哪兒去了呢？
Nǐ gāngcái dào nǎr qù le ne？
Where were you just now?

你到底認不認得她呢？
Nǐ dào dǐ rèn bù rèn de tā ne？
Do you know her or not?

你對這件事是贊成呢, 還是反對呢？
Nǐ duì zhè jiàn shì shì zànchéng ne, hái shì fǎnduì ne？
Are you for or against this?

他們都有任務了, 我呢？
Tāmen dōu yǒu rènwu le, wǒ ne?
They’ve got assignments, what about me?

我錯在哪兒呢？
Wǒ cuò zài nǎr ne？
What is my mistake?

我怎麼能不記得呢？
Wǒ zěnme néng bù jìde ne？
How could I forget this?

這點子事, 何必大驚小怪呢？
Zhè diǎnzi shì, hébì dàjīngxiǎoguài ne？
Why get so excited over such a little thing?

2 [at the end of a declarative sentence to reinforce the assertion]

遠得很, 有好幾千里地呢。
Yuǎn de hěn, yǒu hǎo jǐqiān lǐ dì ne.
It’s a long way off—thousands of li away.

3 [at the end of a declarative sentence to indicate the continuation of an action or a state]

他還在生氣呢。
Tā hái zài shēngqì ne.
He’s still angry.

張先生, 有人找你呢。
Zhāng xiānsheng, yǒurén zhǎo nǐ ne.
Mr Zhang, somebody is looking for you.

4 [used to mark a pause]

不下雨呢, 就去;下雨呢, 就不去。
Bù xià yǔ ne,  jiù qù ； xiàyǔ ne, jiù bù qù.
If it doesn’t rain, we’ll go; if it does, we won’t.

如今呢, 可比以往任何時候都要強。
Rújīn ne, kě bǐ yǐwǎng rènhé shíhou dōu yào qiáng.
As for the present, things are far better than at any time in the past.

definition:
noun 1 cause; reason 理由 lǐyóu reason; ground; argument 因由 yīnyóu reason; cause; origin 2 (Yóu) a surname 
verb 1 pass through; go by way of 必由之路 bìyóuzhīlù road one must follow (or take); only way 2 be up to sb.; rest with sb. 由著性子 Yóu zhe xìngzi do as one pleases 由她去吧。 Yóu tā qù ba. Let her do as she pleases. 事不由己。 Shì bù yóu jǐ. Things are beyond one’s control. or Things are getting out of hand. 花色很多, 由你挑選。 Huāsè hěn duō, yóu nǐ tiāoxuǎn. There’s a great variety of designs and colours for you to choose from. 
preposition 1 by; through; via 由水路而來 Yóu shuǐlù ér lái come by the water route 由此入內。 Yóucǐ rù nèi. This way in. or Entrance. 由邊門出去。 Yóu biānmén chūqu. Exit by the side door. 2 (done) by sb. 須由大會通過 Xū yóu dàhuì tōngguò be subject to acceptance by a general meeting 會議由老李主持。 Huìyì yóu lǎo lǐ zhǔchí. Lao Li will preside over the meeting. 這個錢該由我付。 Zhège qián gāi yóu wǒ fù. This money should be paid by me. 這件事由他處理。 Zhè jiàn shì yóu tā chǔlǐ. Leave it to him. 3 because of; due to 由粗心大意造成的錯誤 yóu cūxīndàyì zàochéng de cuòwù mistakes due to carelessness 4 by means of 句子是由詞組成的。 Jùzi shì yóu cí zǔchéng de. A sentence is made up of words. 水由氫與氧化合而成。 Shuǐ yóu qīng yǔ yǎnghuà hé ér chéng. Water is composed of hydrogen and oxygen. 代表由民主協商選舉產生。 Dàibiǎo yóu mínzhǔ xiéshāng xuǎnjǔ chǎnshēng. The representatives were elected after democratic consultation. 5 from 由點到面 yóudiǎndàomiàn spread over a whole area from one point 由下而上 yóuxià'érshàng from bottom to top; from the lower level upward; from below 由銀川出發 Yóu Yínchuān chūfā set off from Yinchuan 由漢語譯成英語 yóu Hànyǔ yì chéng Yīngyǔ translate from Chinese into English 由儉入奢易, 由奢入儉難。(司馬光《訓儉示康》) yóu jiǎn rù shē yì, yóu shē rù jiǎn nán It is easy to go from frugality to extravagance, but difficult to go from extravagance to frugality.

I returned on March the first.

definition: adjective 1 (of a wild animal or of one's temper, words, etc.) fierce; terrible 老虎比獅子還厲害。 lǎohǔ bǐ shīzi hái lìhai. His appearance is very stern. 我要給他點兒厲害。 Wǒ yào gěi tā diǎnrlìhai. I’ll teach him a lesson. 我們老師很厲害。 Wǒmen lǎoshī hěn lìhai. It’s been terribly hot these few days. 4 colloquial great; impressive; awesome; amazing 她是個很厲害的演員。 Tā shì ge hěn lìhai de yǎnyuán. definition: pronoun usually literary so; such; in this way; like that 如此等等 rúcǐ děngděng and so on and so forth 如此勇敢 Rúcǐ yǒnggǎn so brave 似乎是如此。 Sìhū shì rúcǐ. He has always been so. or He’s always like this. 如此聰明的孩子很少見。 Rúcǐ cōngming de háizi hěn shǎojiàn. Such an intelligent child is rarely seen. 事已如此, 後悔也是枉然。 Shì yǐ rúcǐ, hòuhuǐ yě shì wǎngrán. Now it’s done, regrets are of no avail. or It’s no use crying over spilt milk. 朋友之間互相幫助, 理當如此。 Péngyou zhījiān hùxiāng bāngzhù, lǐdāng rúcǐ. Friends always help each other, and rightly so. 他來得如此之快, 完全出乎意料。 Tā lái de rúcǐ zhī kuài, wánquán chūhū yìliào. I never expected him to get here so soon.

definition:

verb 1 link; join; connect 把兩條電線連起來 bǎ liǎng tiáo diànxiàn lián qǐlai connect two electric wires 把零散的土地連成一片 Bǎ língsǎn de tǔdì liánchéng yī piàn join together scattered pieces of land 天連水, 水連天。 Tiān lián shuǐ, shuǐ liántiān. The two sentences are disconnected (or don’t hang together). 2 involve (in trouble); implicate 那件事把他也連上了。 nà jiàn shì bǎ tā yě lián shàng le. He was involved in that too. 
adverb continuously; in succession; one after another 連挫強手 lián cuò qiángshǒu defeat strong opponents one after another 連發三條短信 Liánfā sān tiáo duǎnxìn send three short messages in succession 
preposition 1 including 連你一共十個人。 Lián nǐ yī gòng shí ge rén. There are ten people, including you. 2 [used correlatively with 也,都, etc.] even 連我都知道。 Lián wǒ dōu zhīdao. Even I know. 他連報也看不懂。 Tā lián bào yě kàn bù dǒng. He can’t even read a newspaper. 他連看都沒看。 Tā lián kàn dōu méi kàn. He didn’t even look. 她緊張得連他姓什麼也沒問。 tā jǐnzhāng de lián tā xìng shénme yě méi wèn. definition: auxiliary 1 [at the end of a sentence to express enthusiasm] 多好的天兒啊！ Duō hǎo de tiānr a! What a fine day! 這次參觀收穫不小啊！ Zhè cì cānguān shōuhuò bù xiǎo a! We’ve learned so much during this visit! 2 [at the end of a sentence to express impatience or what is obvious] 你這話說得是啊。 Nǐ zhè huà shuō de shì a. What you say is quite true. or You’re absolutely right. 我沒有去是因為我病了啊。 Wǒ méiyǒu qù shì yīnwèi wǒ bìng le a, I didn’t go because I was ill. 我也沒說你全錯了啊。 Wǒ yě méi shuō nǐ quán cuò le a. I didn’t say you were entirely wrong, did I? 3 [at the end of an order, warning, etc.] 快走啊！ Kuài zǒu a! Hurry up! 你可要小心啊！ Nǐ kě yào xiǎoxīn a! Do be careful! 4 [at the end of a sentence to express questioning] 是誰啊？ Shì shuí a？ Who is it? 這消息是真的啊？ Zhè xiāoxi shì zhēn de a？ Is this really true? 這本書你倒是要不要啊？ Zhè běn shū nǐ dào shì yào bù yào a？ So do you really want this book? 5 [indicating a deliberate pause] 你啊, 老這樣下去可不行！ Nǐ a, lǎo zhèyàng xiàqu kě bùxíng! Look, you can’t go on like this. 去年啊, 去年這會兒啊, 我還在上海呢。 Qùnián a,  qùnián zhèhuìr a, wǒ hái zài Shànghǎi ne. Well, last year—about this time last year, I was still in Shanghai. 6 [enumerating items] 茄子啊, 黃瓜啊, 洋白菜啊, 西紅柿啊, 各種蔬菜擺滿了貨架。 Qiézi a,  huánggua a,  yángbáicài a,  xīhóngshì a, gèzhǒng shūcài bǎi mǎn le huòjià. The shelves were filled with all sorts of vegetables—eggplants, cucumbers, cabbages, tomatoes. 這啊, 那啊, 她說了一大堆。 Zhè a,  nà a,  tā shuō le yī dà duī, She talked about this, that, and the other—oh, she said a lot of things.

This box won’t stand much weight. 2 keep under control; control; keep under; quell; hold back 壓低嗓門 yādī sǎngmén lower one’s voice; speak under one’s breath 壓住怒火 yā zhù nùhuǒ control one’s anger; hold back one’s rage 壓住敵人的火力 yā zhù dírén de huǒlì still the enemy’s fire 喝點兒熱水把咳嗽壓一壓 hē diǎnr rèshuǐ bǎ késouyā yī yā drink some hot water to ease a cough 3 bring pressure to bear on; suppress; daunt; intimidate 不受捧, 不怕壓 Bù shòu pěng, bù pà yā withstand both flattery and pressure 別拿大帽子壓人。 Bié ná dàmàozi yā rén. Don’t you try to intimidate people by pinning labels on them. 再大的自然災害也壓不垮我們。 Zài dà de zìrán zāihài yě yā bù kuǎ wǒmen. Even a greater natural calamity cannot daunt us. 4 approach; be getting near; draw near 太陽壓山了。 Tàiyáng yā shān le. The setting sun was touching the hilltop. 5 shelve; set aside 這份公文壓了不少時間。 Zhè fèn gōngwén yā le bùshǎo shíjiān. definition: adjective 1 soft; flexible; supple; pliable (opp. 硬) 軟椅 ruǎn yǐ soft chair 軟任務 ruǎn rènwu elastic (or open-ended) task 柳條很軟。 Liǔtiáo hěn ruǎn. Willow twigs are pliable. 2 soft; mild; gentle 你對他軟了些。 Nǐ duì tā ruǎn le xiē. You’ve been a bit soft with him. 他話說得太軟了。 Tā huà shuō de tài ruǎn le. He spoke too mildly. 兒子一哭, 她心就軟了下來。 Érzi yī kū, tā xīn jiù ruǎn le xiàlai. When she saw her son cry, her heart softened. 3 weak; feeble 他兩腿發軟。 Tā liǎng tuǐ fā ruǎn. His legs felt weak (or like jelly). 近來爺爺的身子骨兒越來越軟。 Jìnlái yéye de shēnzigǔr yuèláiyuè ruǎn. Grandfather has been getting feebler lately. 4 poor in quality, ability, etc. 工夫軟 gōngfu ruǎn inadequate skill 貨色軟 Huòsè ruǎn poor-quality goods 5 easily moved (or influenced) 心腸軟 Xīncháng ruǎn tender-hearted 6 in a mild (or gentle) manner 軟纏 ruǎn chán pester; bother 7 indulgent; lenient 毫不手軟 Háobù shǒu ruǎn be resolute; be ruthless

definition:
noun [after 年, 月, 省 or 縣 to form units for differentiation] 年份 niánfèn year 月份 yuèfèn month 
measure word 1 share; part; portion (of a whole) 把錢平分成三份。 Bǎ qián píng fēnchéng sān fèn. Divide the money into three equal shares. 這一份是你的。 Zhè yī fèn shì nǐ de. This share is yours. 2 [with numerals to form a nominal phrase] part; portion 送一份禮 Sòng yī fèn lǐ present a gift 為祖國出一份力 wèi zǔguó chū yī fèn lì do one’s bit for one’s country 兩份客飯, 三份冰激凌 liǎng fèn kèfàn, sān fèn bīngjilíng two set meals and three ice creams 跟大伙兒一樣, 我也為她擔著一份心呢！ gēn dàhuǒr yīyàng, wǒ yě wèi tā dān zhe yī fèn xīn ne! I’m worried about her just as you are. 3 [for certain nonphysical things, used after 這 or 那] 瞧他那份神氣！ Qiáo tā nà fèn shénqi! Look what airs he puts on! 我心裡那份痛快就甭提了。 Wǒ xīnli nà fèn tòngkuai jiù béngtíle. Needless to say, I was overjoyed. 4 [for documents, newspapers, periodicals, etc.] copy 一份《人民日報》 Yī fèn 《Rénmín Rìbào》 a copy of People’s Daily 這篇報告請複印三份。 Zhè piān bàogào qǐng fùyìn sān fèn. Xerox three copies of this report, please. 協議一式兩份, 每份都用漢語和英語寫成, 兩種文本具有同等效力。 Xiéyì yī shì liǎng fèn,  měi fèn dōu yòng Hànyǔ hé Yīngyǔ xiě chéng, liǎng zhǒng wénběn jùyǒu tóngděng xiàolì. The agreement is in duplicate, in the Chinese and English languages, both texts being equally authentic.
formatted_back:
份
PY fèn

NOUN
[after 年, 月, 省 or 縣 to form units for differentiation]

年份
niánfèn
year

月份
yuèfèn
month


MEASURE WORD
1 share; part; portion (of a whole)

把錢平分成三份。
Bǎ qián píng fēnchéng sān fèn.
Divide the money into three equal shares.

這一份是你的。
Zhè yī fèn shì nǐ de.
This share is yours.

2 [with numerals to form a nominal phrase] part; portion

送一份禮
Sòng yī fèn lǐ
present a gift

為祖國出一份力
wèi zǔguó chū yī fèn lì
do one’s bit for one’s country

兩份客飯, 三份冰激凌
liǎng fèn kèfàn, sān fèn bīngjilíng
two set meals and three ice creams

跟大伙兒一樣, 我也為她擔著一份心呢！
gēn dàhuǒr yīyàng, wǒ yě wèi tā dān zhe yī fèn xīn ne!
I’m worried about her just as you are.

3 [for certain nonphysical things, used after 這 or 那]

瞧他那份神氣！
Qiáo tā nà fèn shénqi!
Look what airs he puts on!

我心裡那份痛快就甭提了。
Wǒ xīnli nà fèn tòngkuai jiù béngtíle.
Needless to say, I was overjoyed.

4 [for documents, newspapers, periodicals, etc.] copy

一份《人民日報》
Yī fèn 《Rénmín Rìbào》
a copy of People’s Daily

這篇報告請複印三份。
Zhè piān bàogào qǐng fùyìn sān fèn.
Xerox three copies of this report, please.

協議一式兩份, 每份都用漢語和英語寫成, 兩種文本具有同等效力。
Xiéyì yī shì liǎng fèn,  měi fèn dōu yòng Hànyǔ hé Yīngyǔ xiě chéng, liǎng zhǒng wénběn jùyǒu tóngděng xiàolì.
The agreement is in duplicate, in the Chinese and English languages, both texts being equally authentic.

definition: verb explain; expound; interpret 解釋法律 jiěshì fǎlǜ interpret laws 解釋新詞 jiěshì xīncí explain a new word 對這件事你怎樣解釋？ Duì zhè jiàn shì nǐ zěnyàng jiěshì? How do you account for this? 這些事實不能有別的解釋。 Zhèxiē shìshí bù néng yǒu bié de jiěshì. The facts admit of no other explanation. 這是誤會, 解釋一下就行了。 Zhè shì wùhuì, jiěshì yīxià jiù xíng le. This is a misunderstanding. A little explanation will clear it up. 河水的流動可以用重力原理來解釋。 Héshuǐ de liúdòng kěyǐ yòng zhònglì yuánlǐ lái jiěshì. The flow of river water is explained by the principle of gravity. 對本協定在解釋上遇有分岐, 應以中文本為準。 Duìběn xiédìng zài jiěshì shàng yù yǒufèn qí, yīng yǐ Zhōngwén běn wéi zhǔn. In case of divergence of interpretation of this agreement, the Chinese text shall prevail.

definition:
noun 1 upheaval; riot; unrest; turmoil 內亂 nèiluàn civil strife 戰亂 zhànluàn chaos caused by war; war 2 disorder; disturbance; trouble 添亂兒 Tiān luàn r add confusion to sth. 當斷不斷, 反受其亂。 dāngduànbùduàn, fǎn shòu qí luàn. Being indecisive will lead to troubles. 3 archaic literature last paragraph of a musical composition or genre of classical Chinese poetry 
verb throw into disorder; confuse; mix up 亂了方寸 luàn le fāngcùn put one’s mind in turmoil; be greatly agitated 亂了手腳 luànleshǒujiǎo throw sb. into disarray 君其遺之女樂, 以亂其政。(《韓非子》) Jūn qí wèi zhī nǚ yuè, yǐ luàn qí zhèng. (《Hán Fēi Zǐ》) You might send him some women musicians to throw his rule into disorder. 
adjective 1 in disorder; in a mess; in confusion 全亂了 quán luàn le be in a utter (or wild) confusion 線亂了。 Xiàn luàn le. The thread is tangled. 車站很亂。 Chēzhàn hěn luàn. The station was in a state of disorder. 屋裡很亂, 請收拾一下。 wū lǐ hěn luàn, qǐng shōushi yīxià. The room is in a mess; please tidy it up. 這篇稿子太亂, 是不是重抄一下？ Zhè piān gǎozi tài luàn, shì bù shì zhòng chāo yīxià？ The manuscript’s too messy. How about copying it out? 這裡太亂, 找個安靜點兒的地方談談。 Zhèlǐ tài luàn, zhǎo ge ānjìng diǎnr de dìfang tán tán. It’s too noisy here; let’s find a quieter place to chat. 2 in a confused state of mind 我心裡很亂。 Wǒ xīnli hěn luàn. My mind is in turmoil. 3 (of a society) turbulent; riotous See 26311424亂世luan4shi4亂世 4 (of sexual relationships) improper; promiscuous 性亂行為 Xìng luàn xíngwéi sexual promiscuity 
adverb indiscriminately; at random; arbitrarily 亂跑 luànpǎo run all over the place; dash about 亂扔 luànrēng tumble over 亂罰款 luàn fákuǎn impose unjustified fines 亂花錢 luànhuāqián spend money extravagantly 亂收費 luàn shōufèi collect fees arbitrarily 亂出主意 luàn chū zhǔyi give advice offhand 亂穿馬路 luànchuānmǎlù jaywalk 亂講一氣 luànjiǎng yī qì speak indiscreetly; make irresponsible remarks 亂作決定 luànzuòjuédìng make an arbitrary decision 他在牆上亂寫。 Tā zài qiáng shàng luàn xiě. verb 1 part; leave each other 我們分別快兩年了。 Wǒmen fēnbié kuài liǎng nián le. It’s almost two years since we parted. 分別不久他們又見面了。 fēnbié bùjiǔ tāmen yòu jiànmiàn le. They met again after a short separation. 2 distinguish; differentiate 分別善惡 Fēnbié shàn'è distinguish good from evil 
noun difference 兩者之間沒有任何分別。 Liǎngzhě zhījiān méiyǒu rènhé fēnbié. There is no difference between the two. 
adverb 1 in different ways; differently 對他們兩人應該分別對待。 Duì tāmen liǎng rén yīnggāi fēnbié duìdài. You should treat the two of them differently. 根據具體情況, 分別處理。 Gēnjù jùtǐ qíngkuàng, fēnbié chǔlǐ. Deal with the cases in different ways, according to specific conditions. 2 separately; individually; respectively 你還是分別跟他們談談的好。 Nǐ hái shì fēnbié gēn tāmen tán tán de hǎo. You’d better have a talk with each of them separately. 他們分別代表本國政府在協定上簽了字。 Tāmen fēnbié dàibiǎo běnguó zhèngfǔ zài xiédìng shàng qiān le zì. The horse has a fine coat of hair. 2 (of humans) hair; beard 眉毛 méimáo eyebrows 3 plant; crop 不毛之地 bùmáozhīdì barren land 4 wool 毛襪 máowà woollen stocks 這件夾克衫是棉的還是毛的？ Zhè jiàn jiákè shān shì mián de hái shì máo de？ Is this jacket cotton or woollen? 5 mildew; mould 長了毛的麵包 Zhǎng le máo de miànbāo mouldy bread 6 (Máo) a surname 
adjective 1 rough; semi-finished See 26568448毛坯mao2pi1毛坯 2 gross See 26566400毛利mao2li4毛利 3 little; small 毛賊 máozéi petty thief; pilferer 4 thin See 26569472毛渠mao2qu2毛渠 
adjective 1 careless; crude; rash 毛頭毛腦 máotóumáonǎo rash; impetuous 2 panic; scared; nervous 發毛 fāmáo flustered 嚇毛了 xiàmáole scared 3 dialect get angry; lose one's temper 把他惹毛了 bǎ tā rě máo le made him angry 
verb colloquial 1 (of currency) no longer worth its face value; depreciated 錢毛了。 Qián máo le. Money has gone down in value. 2 (of horses, cattle, etc.) be startled 
measure word colloquial mao (a fractional unit of money in China, equal to 1/10 yuan or 10 fen) 一毛錢 Yī máo qián one mao 這支筆幾毛錢？——四毛。 Zhè zhī bǐ jǐ máo qián？ —— sì máo. How much is this pen?—Four mao.

We really don’t understand why such a small matter is so hard to settle. 這個人雖然住我隔壁, 但奇怪的是我從未見到他。 Zhège rén suīrán zhù wǒ gébì, dàn qíguài de shì wǒ cóngwèi jiàn dào tā. He lives right next door, but strangely enough I’ve never seen him. 
adjective strange; surprising; odd 奇怪的聲音 qíguài de shēngyīn strange noise 奇怪的現象 qíguài de xiànxiàng unusual phenomena 這個問題提得很奇怪。 Zhège wèntí tí de hěn qíguài. It’sa strange question to raise. 各有各的愛好, 沒什麼奇怪 。 Gè yǒu gè de àihào, méi shénme qíguài. Everyone has his or her own hobby. It’s only natural. 螢火蟲很奇怪, 身體能發光。 Yínghuǒchóng hěn qíguài, shēntǐ néng fāguāng. The firefly is a strange insect that can give off light. 真奇怪, 他們至今還一無所知。 Zhēn qíguài, tāmen zhìjīn hái yīwúsuǒzhī. It’sreally surprising that they should still be in the dark. 隕石雨是一種自然現象, 沒有什麼可奇怪的。 Yǔnshíyǔ shì yī zhǒng zìrán xiànxiàng, méiyǒu shénme kě qíguài de. A meteorite shower is a natural phenomenon; there’s nothing strange about it.
formatted_back:
奇怪
PY qíguài

VERB
feel surprised; wonder

我奇怪他怎麼不來。
Wǒ qíguài tā zěnme bù lái.
I wonder why he didn’t come.

他們都奇怪你為什麼要辭職。
Tāmen dōu qíguài nǐ wèishénme yào cízhí.
They feel surprised at your resignation.

我們都奇怪為什麼這點兒小事就是辦不了。
wǒmen dōu qíguài wèishénme zhèdiǎnr xiǎoshì jiùshì bànbuliǎo.
We really don’t understand why such a small matter is so hard to settle.

這個人雖然住我隔壁, 但奇怪的是我從未見到他。
Zhège rén suīrán zhù wǒ gébì, dàn qíguài de shì wǒ cóngwèi jiàn dào tā.
He lives right next door, but strangely enough I’ve never seen him.


ADJECTIVE
strange; surprising; odd

奇怪的聲音
qíguài de shēngyīn
strange noise

奇怪的現象
qíguài de xiànxiàng
unusual phenomena

這個問題提得很奇怪。
Zhège wèntí tí de hěn qíguài.
It’sa strange question to raise.

各有各的愛好, 沒什麼奇怪 。
Gè yǒu gè de àihào, méi shénme qíguài.
Everyone has his or her own hobby. It’s only natural.

螢火蟲很奇怪, 身體能發光。
Yínghuǒchóng hěn qíguài, shēntǐ néng fāguāng.
The firefly is a strange insect that can give off light.

真奇怪, 他們至今還一無所知。
Zhēn qíguài, tāmen zhìjīn hái yīwúsuǒzhī.
It’sreally surprising that they should still be in the dark.

隕石雨是一種自然現象, 沒有什麼可奇怪的。
Yǔnshíyǔ shì yī zhǒng zìrán xiànxiàng, méiyǒu shénme kě qíguài de.
A meteorite shower is a natural phenomenon; there’s nothing strange about it.

definition: verb unable; incapable 無法形容 wúfǎ xíngróng beyond description 無法應付 wúfǎ yìngfu unable to cope with; at the end of one’s resources 無法解脫的困境 wúfǎ jiětuō de kùnjìng inextricable dilemma 局勢無法控制。 Júshì wúfǎ kòngzhì. The situation was out of control.
